item.title: 1.1: Introduction to Public Economics
item.description: Contents Overview Readings for Discussion Slides Wednesday, January 15, 2020 Overview This introduction will give an overview of the course and the topics that we will cover. A primary question we will address this semester is how do we choose in groups? Readings for Discussion There are no readings assigned for todayâ€™s class, but see the required readings (and email questions) for discussion for next class.

item.title: 3.1: Voting I: Preference Aggregation & Cycling
